author: K
comment: Occupies less than half the screen. Shame
title: Terrible on Huawei Watch

author: sid
comment: Used to look perfect on my Moto 360, the latest update makes the bottom line of text misaligned with the other lines.
title: Last update broke alignment

author: Davut Uçar
comment: Pls update for moto360 then it will be 5 stars

reply.author: Carlos L
reply.content: Hi, The latest update should have better support for round smartwatches. Please let me know if you still have problems on your moto 360!

title: Moto360

author: Eric Andresen
comment: Great concept! Configuration could be a bit more clear and option-full, but I'd probably want black-and-white anyway. I'd love to add new languages too! Especially Swiizerduutch ;-)

author: mahindra jith
comment: At first seemed buggy but the updates are making this better and im starting to use this.
title: Getting better

author: Preyash Chauhan
comment: Could do with being a bit more accurate. Its 11:08, but the watch says five past eleven.
title: Works...kind of

author: Dim Dayz
comment: Like the ability to change the location on the Watch! Good job. Update seems to have worked ;)
title: Like it!

author: Scott MacWatters
comment: There is some overlap on bigger notifications between the text and the watch face. Maybe dim the watch face to avoid conflicts?
title: Good job, but needs polish

comment: To those complaining about accuracy and being "unfinished," look up the Qlocktwo clocks & watches. Some very expensive timepieces I would love to have, but this will do. Looks great on the Gear Live.
title: My Favorite Watchface

author: Julian Braha
comment: The 'OK google' phrase that appears on the watch face is put right on top of some of the words, meaning that the words look jumbled up and glitchy. Second, it is only accurate to the nearest 5 minutes. At 3:17 it says "its a quarter past 3". This isn't a huge problem, but it just seems...unfinished. My top notification also ends up covering the bottom layer of words.
title: A cool idea that doesn't work well

author: Michael Janes
comment: Great watchface except when you tap to wake your watch the "Say OK Google"  overlaps "it is" - LG g
title: Overlapping text

author: Andrew Cosand
comment: The overall implementation is nice but I really wish it had an option to show the time in one minute intervals in words rather than just adding dots
title: Five minute precision

author: Carlos Mendez
comment: Would be great if it was not off center on moto 360

reply.author: Carlos L
reply.content: Hi, The latest update should have better support for round smartwatches. Please let me know if you still have problems on your moto 360!

title: Strange crop on moto 360
